userdoc.notice: helper methods for interacting with ERC20 tokens that do not consistently return true/false with the addition of a transfer function to send eth or an erc20 token

documentation.text:
helper methods for interacting with ERC20 tokens that do not consistently return true/false
with the addition of a transfer function to send eth or an erc20 token
